oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proceedings : twenty years of selenium fertilization, September 8-9, 2005, Helsinki, Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eurola, Merja (ed.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With the workshop theme "Twenty years of selenium fertilization" the organizers wanted to summarize the 20-year research period of Finnish selenium supplemented fertilization and bring togehter people interested in selenium. The main areas of the program and proceedings are: selenium fertilization, selenium in foods and diets and selenium and health. The proceedings include 13 short papers written by the speakers, and 26 abstracts of poster presentations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eurola, Merja (ed.) (2005) Proceedings : twenty years of selenium fertilization, September 8-9, 2005, Helsinki, Finland. Agrifood Research Reports, no. 69. MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
